mapper.select: SELECT DG.ID , DG.LEVEL , DG.RENTAL_PRODUCT_COUNT , DG.RENTAL_RETENTION_RATE , DG.NEW_CUSTOMER_COUNT , DG.TOTAL_RENTAL_AMOUNT , (DG.CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_SCORE * 10) , DG.TARGET_YEAR FROM DEFAULT_GOAL DG WHERE DG.LEVEL = #{employeeLevel} AND DG.TARGET_YEAR = #{targetYear}

SELECT EG.ID , EG.RENTAL_PRODUCT_COUNT , EG.RENTAL_RETENTION_COUNT , EG.TOTAL_RENTAL_COUNT , EG.NEW_CUSTOMER_COUNT , EG.TOTAL_RENTAL_AMOUNT , (EG.CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_SCORE * 10) , EG.CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_COUNT , EG.TARGET_DATE , EG.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM EMPLOYEE_GOAL EG WHERE EG.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId} AND EG.TARGET_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{targetYear}, '%') ORDER BY TARGET_DATE
